mapper.insert:
insert into log_request (id, request_id, user_id, uri, `method`, ua, path_param, body_param, ip, begin_time, end_time, consumed_time, response_code, response_msg, response_data, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, version, is_deleted) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.uri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ua,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.pathParam,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.bodyParam,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.ip,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.consumedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.responseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.responseMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.responseData,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=BOOLEAN})
